title: Teacher Form Submissions
subtitle: View and manage teacher form submissions per academic year.

filters.title: Filters
filters.subtitle: Filter submissions by academic year, teacher, or processing status.
filters.teacherPlaceholder: Search by teacher name or email

form.description: View the complete details of this form submission.

statusDialog.title: Change Processing Status
statusDialog.messageProcessed: Are you sure you want to mark this submission as processed?
statusDialog.messageUnprocessed: Are you sure you want to mark this submission as unprocessed?

formLink.title: Generate Form Link
formLink.description: Generate a shareable link for a teacher to fill out their form.

errors.title: Error
errors.missingFields: Please select both teacher and academic year.
errors.copyFailed: Failed to copy link to clipboard.
errors.alreadyExists: A form submission already exists for this teacher and academic year.
errors.yearLocked: Cannot generate form link for locked academic year.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.unknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

info.title: How to share
info.description: Copy the link above and share it with the teacher via email or any other method. The teacher can use this link to fill out and submit their form without logging in.

publicForm.title: Teacher Form Submission
publicForm.description: Please fill out your form for {{yearName}}. This form is for {{teacherName}}.
publicForm.subjectsHint: Select all subjects you are qualified to teach
publicForm.availabilityOptionsHint: Please select at least two availability options
publicForm.internshipTypes: Internship Types You Are Willing to Supervise
publicForm.notesPlaceholder: Enter any additional notes, special remarks, or preferences...
publicForm.notesHint: Optional: Add any additional information that might be relevant

validation.subjectsRequired: Please select at least one subject
validation.availabilityOptionsRequired: Please select at least two availability options
validation.internshipTypeRequired: Please select an internship type preference
validation.internshipCombinationsRequired: Please select at least one internship combination
validation.semesterAvailabilityRequired: Please select at least one semester availability

success.title: Form Submitted Successfully
success.message: Thank you {{teacherName}}! Your form submission for {{yearName}} has been received successfully.

errors.title: Error
errors.notFound: Form not found or has already been submitted.
errors.submitFailed: Failed to submit form. Please try again.
